document_data.name: Barze
document_data.mainbody: '''Barze''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and later a sorcerer-king of his self-titled Kingdom of [[Barze]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|79}}
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|-457}}, the war-weary Barze and his followers fled persecution in Netheril. They left the [[Negarath Enclave]] and traveled east for many months. At the start of winter, they  discovered a fertile dale, and it was there that Barze founded his kingdom.

The sorcerer-king was happy{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|48-49}} [[Bhaal|An assassin]] killed him stealthily and without a fight, leaving his kingdom to fall to the [[Twisted Ones]].

Barze's tale would be remembered in part within texts later deemed to be heretical by followers of the [[Dead Three]]. As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], he was the subject of a chapter in a book called ''[[The Great Diaspora of Netheril]]''.
